faq.question: What makes STEM Gharbiya academics different?
faq.answer: Our curriculum centers on student-driven learning with hands-on research, collaborative projects, and real-world problem-solving. We combine rigorous academics with mentorship and innovation labs to develop researchers and leaders, not just test-takers.

faq.question: Are courses honors or AP?
faq.answer: Most STEM-core courses are taught at the honors level. We focus on deep conceptual understanding and research skills rather than AP test preparation. Honors courses are more rigorous and project-intensive than regular courses.

faq.question: How are capstone projects graded?
faq.answer: Capstone projects count toward 40% of final grades in STEM core courses. Grading is based on research quality, innovation, collaboration, presentation, and real-world impact. Projects are evaluated by faculty mentors and sometimes external experts.

faq.question: What is the student-teacher ratio for lab courses?
faq.answer: Our science and engineering labs maintain a 1:15 ratio to ensure hands-on support. Each student works directly with faculty and lab technicians on experiments and builds.

faq.question: How does the grading system work?
faq.answer: We use a letter grading system from A+ to F. Grades reflect mastery of content, research contribution, and presentation skills. Mid-term and final projects are weighted more heavily than traditional exams.

faq.question: Can I choose between math and science tracks?
faq.answer: Yes. All students take a core set of subjects, but you can choose either a Mathematics-focused or Sciences-focused track starting in 11th grade. Both tracks include engineering and innovation modules.

faq.question: What support is available for struggling students?
faq.answer: We offer peer tutoring, faculty office hours, study groups, and academic counseling. Students who fall behind in STEM courses receive additional mentoring and can access recorded lectures and resources.

faq.question: How do universities view our academics?
faq.answer: Top universities recognize our rigorous curriculum and research outcomes. Our graduates have earned scholarships and admissions to leading STEM programs globally. Our capstone projects and research experience give students a significant advantage.
